Function# OSDataCreate

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
OSDataPtr OSDataCreate(const void * bytes, size_t length);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/DriverKit/OSDataCreate#see-also)

### [Creating a Data Object](/documentation/DriverKit/OSDataCreate#Creating-a-Data-Object)

[`withBytes`](/documentation/driverkit/osdata/withbytes)Allocates an OSData object with a copy of bytes.[`withBytesNoCopy`](/documentation/driverkit/osdata/withbytesnocopy)Allocates an OSData object with a copy of bytes.[`withCapacity`](/documentation/driverkit/osdata/withcapacity)Allocates an OSData object with preallocated capacity.[`withData`](/documentation/driverkit/osdata/withdata-9y3g)Allocates an OSData object with a copy of bytes from another OSData.[`withData`](/documentation/driverkit/osdata/withdata-4rd8n)Allocates an OSData object with a copy of bytes from a subset of another OSData.[`OSDataPtr`](/documentation/driverkit/osdataptr)[`free`](/documentation/driverkit/osdata/free)
